https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3ucMWUc3hGmBF3nUWuQWyaDFkKk.jpg Despite her short skirt and bobbed hair, Myrtle’s no flapper—she’s a career girl with her eye on the prize. But over the course of an evening in the company of Jack, a bootlegger, she’s forced to ask herself what she really wants: a legitimate career, or success at any cost. Bitter Orange
